column1: Image:Jeremy Bennett - Folca hunting the Boar of Everholt.jpg hunting the Boar of Everholt by Jeremy Bennett for The Lord of the Rings (film series).
The Boar of Everholt was a monstrous beast that inhabited Everholt in the Firienholt
column2: around the feet of the Halifirien in the White Mountains. The great hunter Folca of Rohan
column3: having rid his country of the Orcs
column4: set out to hunt down the Boars. He succeeded
column5: but received mortal tusk-wounds that brought his Kingship to an end.
